entry.title: ANGLE_instanced_arrays : revision 3
entry.summary: Renumbered to 19 to fix misnumbering problem.

entry.title: OES_texture_float_linear : revision 2
entry.summary: Moved to draft status after discussion on public_webgl.

entry.title: OES_texture_half_float_linear : revision 2
entry.summary: Moved to draft status after discussion on public_webgl.

entry.title: WEBGL_draw_buffers : revision 4
entry.summary: Renamed to WEBGL_draw_buffers per discussion on public_webgl list. Added guarantees to make it easier for developers to use the extension.

entry.title: WEBGL_depth_texture : revision 10
entry.summary: Updated to track ANGLE_depth_texture, indicating that only red channel is guaranteed.

entry.title: WEBGL_draw_buffers : revision 3
entry.summary: Renamed to EXT_draw_buffers per plan of OpenGL ES working group. Moved to draft status. Assigned number.

entry.title: WEBGL_depth_texture : revision 9
entry.summary: Moved from draft to community approved status

entry.title: WEBGL_lose_context : revision 8
entry.summary: Moved from draft to community approved status
